Michael Bubl\u00e9: s comments about retiring were meant to be humorous or ironic rather than literal, as he later disclaimed them.
Bubl\u00e9: s spokesperson clarified that he is not retiring and the retirement talk was likely misunderstood or taken out of context.
The theory that Bubl\u00e9: s retirement talk was sarcastic or a way of emphasizing the quality of his new album was suggested by TODAY's Savannah Guthrie.
